name: Step Sequencer
description: A simple note sequencer based on the sequencers in the Expert Sleepers FH-2 module. It can output CV and/or MIDI with each of its 16 steps featuring pitch, velocity, modulation values, division (repeat/ratchet count), pattern (substep activation), and ties for legato playback or gliding CV outputs. The algorithm supports randomization of pitches, rhythm, or both across 32 stored sequences, which can be switched manually or via CV control. Parameters are mappable, enabling complex modulation patterns like LFO-driven pitch evolution.
use_cases: Generating rhythmic and melodic patterns for live performance or composition
Creating evolving sequences with LFO modulation of step parameters
Building layered sequences by chaining multiple stored patterns
Randomizing pitches, rhythms, or both for procedural music generation
Sequencing sequences via CV control for modular synth integration
gui_description: The GUI displays an overview of the 16 steps with pitch values across the top. The current step is highlighted, and start/end steps are marked by solid bars. Edited parameters are visually emphasized, while divisions (repeats/ratchets) and ties are shown graphically as blocks or longer bars. Pitches, velocities, and modulation values for each step are displayed via thin lines to the left.

input_ports.name: Clock Input
input_ports.description: Bus used as the clock input for triggering steps.

input_ports.name: Reset Input
input_ports.description: Bus used to reset the sequencer or trigger run/stop actions, depending on Reset mode setting.

input_ports.name: Sequence CV Input
input_ports.description: CV input scaled such that a semitone (1/12th of a Volt) corresponds to one sequence increment. Used for switching sequences via CV control.

input_ports.name: Sequence Trigger Input
input_ports.description: Trigger input used in conjunction with Sequence CV Input to change sequences on trigger events.

output_ports.name: Pitch Output
output_ports.description: CV output for step pitch values, scaled as MIDI note numbers (0-127).

output_ports.name: Gate Output
output_ports.description: CV gate signal indicating when a step is active. Length determined by Gate type and length settings.

output_ports.name: Velocity Output
output_ports.description: CV output for step velocity values (1-127).

output_ports.name: Modulation Output
output_ports.description: CV output for step modulation values (-10.0 to 10.0 Volts).

output_ports.name: Step Output
output_ports.description: CV output representing the current sequencer step number, scaled as 1/12th of a Volt per step.
